/start.description: Initialize user and show welcome message

response.text:
🚀 Welcome to No_Gas_Slaps™! 

The ultimate P2E game where billionaires get SLAPPED into space! No gas fees, just pure meme-powered action.

💡 How to play:
• Use /slap to launch billionaires
• Earn $SLAP tokens for epic launches
• Upgrade your slapping power
• Climb the leaderboard

Ready to send some billionaires to orbit? 🌌

/slap.response_template:
🎯 *{{billionaire_name}}* got SLAPPED!

{{gif_url}}

{{narrative_outcome}}

💰 Earned: **{{points}} $SLAP**
🎲 Rarity: **{{rarity}}**
📊 Total Score: **{{total_score}}**

/slap again for more orbital action! 🚀

store_items.name: 💪 Power Gloves
store_items.description: Hulk-level slapping power! Send billionaires to Mars with style.

store_items.name: 🚀 Rocket Boots
store_items.description: Because walking is for peasants. Strap on these bad boys for extra orbital boost!

store_items.name: 🧲 Meme Magnet
store_items.description: Attracts viral memes like Elon attracts SEC investigations!

store_items.name: 🌀 Gravity Defier
store_items.description: Newton's laws? Never heard of them. Float like a SpaceX rocket!

store_items.name: 💥 Billionaire Bane
store_items.description: The ultimate anti-billionaire weapon. Guaranteed to make them see stars (literally)!

/help.response:
❓ *How to Play No_Gas_Slaps™*

🎯 **/slap** - Launch billionaires into space
⚡ **/upgrade** - Buy power-ups for bigger launches
💰 **/balance** - Check your $SLAP tokens
🏆 **/leaderboard** - See top players

**Tips:**
• Higher rarity = more points
• Upgrade for better launches
• Share your best slaps for bonuses
• No gas fees ever!

Ready to slap some billionaires? 🚀
